title: "Black Joy":  Black Girl Magic Wine & Book Club
description:
Two Exceptional Wines. One Exceptional Book.

Our March 2022 Wine & Book Club set!
Your purchase includes:

  • Black Joy by Tracey Michae’l Lewis-Giggetts
  • Black Girl Magic California Sparkling Brut
  • Black Girl Magic California Zinfandel 2018
  • Price includes ground shipping, local taxes apply.

About Black Joy
A timely collection of deeply personal, uplifting, and powerful essays that celebrate the redemptive strength of Black Joy.

“Black Joy is a necessary testimony on the magic and beauty of our capacity to live and love fully and out loud.” – Kerry Washington 

Author Tracey Michae’l Lewis-Giggetts
As a writer and educator, Tracey Michae’l Lewis-Giggetts offers those who read her work and hear her speak an authentic experience and opportunity to explore the intersection of culture, identity and faith/spirituality at the deepest levels.  

Never miss a new release! 
Join Our Black Girl Magic Wine & Book Club

JOIN NOW

  • Highly anticipated reads from the publisher’s rich roster of women authors of color, paired with two bottles of our Black Girl Magic wines.
  • Four shipments per year at $99.99 - $109.99 each.
  • Club perks include giveaways, online community and more.
  • In partnership with Simon & Schuster, get hot new releases before they hit the shelves (upon availability).
  • Simply enjoy the wines, books and conversations at your own pace.

title: "Our History is A Gift" : Black History Month 2022
description:
Our wines are an intimate reflection of who we are, and where we come from. During Black History Month, we are reminded of the journeys, people and cultures that have made the McBride Sisters Collection possible. In celebration of our history, journey with us through the African Diaspora as we pair our wines with custom recipes from four incredible chefs. 

Our History is a Gift.

The set includes each of the following wines:

  • Black Girl Magic Sparkling Brut
  • Black Girl Magic Rosé
  • Black Girl Magic Merlot 
  • Black Girl Magic Zinfandel 
  • McBride Sisters Collection Red Blend 
  • McBride Sisters Collection Sauvignon Blanc 

Get the wine recipe pairings for the set on our Eat + Drink page.

title: "Speak":  Black Girl Magic Book Club - May Selection
description:
Find your voice, trust your gut, and get from where you are to where you want to be…

Already recognized as a motivational speaker and global superstar in the fitness world, Tunde Oyeneyin is poised to become the next big name in women’s empowerment and self help. Through her powerful and practical stories of love, loss, and epiphany, Tunde shows how these keys teach us to SPEAK. 

You don’t want to miss our Black Girl Magic Book Club May selection!

Your purchase includes:

  • Speak by Tunde Oyeneyin
  • Black Girl Magic California Merlot 2018
  • Black Girl Magic California Rosé 2020
  • Exclusive invite to live virtual event with the author and Daneia McBride-Rodriguez: May 17, 2022, 8pm EST / 5pm PST
    A link will be emailed to purchasers ahead of the event.
  • Price includes ground shipping, local taxes apply. 

About Speak

Taking us through each step of the SPEAK acronym—Surrender, Power, Empathy, Authenticity, and Knowledge—Oyeneyin shares the lessons she has learned about loss, love, body image, and how she has successfully created an intentional, joyful life for herself, offering an accessible blueprint for anyone looking to make a positive change in their lives.

Never miss a new release! 
Join Our Black Girl Magic Wine & Book Club

JOIN NOW

title: Above and Beyond Set in luxe box
description:
Club Member Price: $379.99


A reflection of the Sisters’ history in the Central Coast of California and in Aotearoa New Zealand, the Above and Beyond set of award-winning wines will take you on a wine journey through different growing regions, grape varietals and wine styles.

California

From one of California’s most prestigious wine regions, Paso Robles, the McBride Sisters Collection Reserve White Wine “Abalone or Pāua?” is a blend of Grenache Blanc, Viognier and Marsanne, showcasing a creamy texture supported by firm acidity.  

Our Reserve Chardonnay and Reserve Pinot Noir are from the Escolle Vineyard in Santa Lucia Highlands, Monterey County, California. The McBride Sisters Collection Reserve Chardonnay “The Great Escape” is a departure from the overly oaked style of many California Chardonnays. Get lost in the enticing aromas and flavors of lemon curd, green apple, pear & peach, beautifully balanced with subtle oak.

The McBride Sisters Collection Reserve Pinot Noir “Cocky Motherf*cker”, awarded 91 points by Wine Enthusiast, exudes pure silk, opulent fruit notes and understated elegance.

New Zealand*

From Central Otago in Aotearoa New Zealand, our Reserve Pinot Noir and Reserve Gamay come from some of the southernmost vineyards in the world.

The McBride Sisters Collection Reserve Gamay "Rebels” is a vibrant dry wine, with a bright ruby color and a savory black pepper element underpinning its fruit-forward core.

The McBride Sisters Collection Reserve Pinot Noir “Papatūānuku” embodies vibrant fruit flavors, while the label tells the story of Andréa's Māori foster family, and the cultures and traditions they cherished. 

Awarded "Editor’s Choice" and 91 points by Wine Enthusiast, the McBride Sisters Collection Sparkling Brut Rosé from Hawke's Bay greets you with gentle floral notes of rose petals, strawberries and cream, and loads of freshly crushed red berries. 

Two luxe gift boxes are included in the price. Add your personalized message at check out and it will print onto a packing slip, no prices will be shown.

*CT, IA, ME, MI and MO residents: We are prohibited from directly shipping our New Zealand wines to your state. Please check our store locator to find a retailer in your area.

title: Black and Gold Box Sticker
Black Girl Magic "Bubbly & Bright" Gift Set
description:
Shop our limited edition Black Girl Magic Wines candle that we created in an exciting partnership with The 125 Collection, a Black women-owned business based in Harlem. This tropical mango candle pairs perfectly with the bright citrus from the Sparkling Brut.

Pairing your candles and wine? Yes, we did that. You’ll need this set for your next girls night in for luxe self care to really shine this holiday season.

—

Gift set includes:
2 x McBride Sisters Collection Black Girl Magic New Zealand* Sparkling Brut
1 x scented Tropical Mango candle from The 125 Collection**
Shipped in an individual luxe, ready-to-give gift box

Black Girl Magic New Zealand* Sparkling Brut 750ml
Pear and candied lemon unite with soft gardenia on the nose. A fine, foamy mousse carries the palate and emphasizes a crisp, green apple flavor that marries perfectly with the citrus and floral notes. 90.36% Chardonnay 9.64% Pinot Gris

Black Girl Magic Wines Tropical Mango Candle** 13.5oz jar (11oz candle)
Top notes of peach, apple, orange, cassis, and citrus blossom into of mango, papaya, and pineapple. These tropical primary middle notes finish with a woody, amber, tonka and musk aroma for layers of complexity. Approximately 80 hours of burn time. Made with a soy wax blend with a lead-free cotton wick. Paraben-free, phthalate-free and vegan.

—

title: Black Girl Magic Merlot California 2018
description:
Stunning garnet red. Enticing black cherry and warm cocoa aromas are mixed with fresh raspberry and plum on the nose. As the wine opens up, the nose evolves into toasty oak, vanilla and black tea leaves. Chocolate and cherry follow you into the palate with luscious and silky tannins. This juicy and sensational wine is a classic Merlot, sophisticated for the wine connoisseur and delicious for the wine novices.

Exclusively sold online.

Don't forget to rate us on Vivino!

title: Black Girl Magic Red Blend California 2019
description:
Our Black Girl Magic collection is an ode to our culture and story, inspired by the magic and resilience of Black women, to be enjoyed by all.

A complex, well-crafted and inviting wine that shows tobacco and vanilla bean notes alongside generous plum, raspberry, and blackberry. The ripe and juicy mouth offers the chocolate cherry flavors typical of Merlot blend with the peppery spice of Cabernet to round out the full body. The finish is bold, gripping, and invites another sip.

Don't forget to rate us on Vivino!

title: Black Girl Magic Riesling California 2020
description:
Intensely aromatic, this wine shows typical ripe Riesling characteristics, including honey, apricot, and white flowers. Tangerine, jasmine, and coriander seed appear in the nose, as the palate turns to tropical flavors evocative of guava and pineapple. Mild sweetness is balanced by a bright core of tangy citrus for a mouth-watering, sweet and sour finish. The result is elegant and complex. Wine like you.

Pairs perfectly with a spicy seafood pasta, seasoned chicken dishes or your favorite charcuterie board. This wine is best enjoyed chilled. 

90 Points | Gold Medal | Monterey International Wine Competition 2021

Don't forget to rate us on Vivino!

About We Are Not Like Them

We Are Not Like Them explores complex questions of race and how they pervade and shape our most intimate spaces in a deeply divided world. But at its heart, it’s a story of enduring friendship—a love that defies the odds even as it faces its most difficult challenges.

description:

Hawke’s Bay is one of the most prestigious fine wine regions in New Zealand. This bubbly wine greets you with gentle floral notes of rose petals, strawberries and cream, and loads of freshly crushed red berries. This is the perfect wine to toast with your loved ones all year long.

title: Bucket Hat - Black Logo
California Reserve Wine Set
description:
After more than a decade of making wine, we’re ready to break the rules with our inaugural McBride Sisters Collection Reserves. Journey to the prestigious Santa Lucia Highlands, where we sourced grapes from a very special vineyard and hand selected rows of vines for this first of its kind McBride Sisters Collection Reserve Wines.

For a limited time, order the California Reserve Wine Set to receive the recording of our Reserve Wines Virtual Tasting with Robin & Andréa.

Our first Reserve Chardonnay and Reserve Pinot Noir are from the Escolle Vineyard in Santa Lucia Highlands, Monterey County, CA. ‘The Great Escape’ Chardonnay embodies bright acidity and a cool climate sophistication, while the label tells the story of Robin and her mother’s journey to their new home in Monterey, California. ‘Cocky Motherf*cker' Pinot Noir, a wine inspired by our father, exudes pure silk, opulent fruit notes and understated elegance.

Your California Reserve Wine Set includes:

1 x limited edition 'The Great Escape' Chardonnay 2019 
1 x limited edition 'Cocky Motherf*cker' Pinot Noir 2018
1 x Zoom link to the recording of our Virtual Tasting 
Luxe gift box & shipping is included in the price

For a limited time, we're including a link to the recording of our Reserve Wines Virtual Tasting for you to watch while you taste and enjoy these wines. Join Robin & Andréa as they take you through the story behind these special wines, the labels and much more!

description:

Leak-proof, high-density foam refrigerant bricks, inserted into 100% recyclable foam, provide temperature control for 48+ hours.

Please select this add-on to protect your wines if your delivery area is above 85 degrees. We cannot replace or guarantee your wines otherwise.

description:
Wines with a side of confidence, this McBride Sisters Collection six pack is for when you're feelin' like your best self. There's a wine for every occasion in this classic set. Enjoy your white wine on the patio, pop the bubbly for Friday happy hour and sip the red cozied up on the couch. 

Wine + Feelin' Myself Set Pairing Guide | Recipes curated to pair perfectly with these wines... We're talkin' Cardamom French Toast Bake, Thai Coconut Curry & more. Get the guide here.

_

1x McBride Sisters Collection Hawke's Bay New Zealand Sparkling Brut NV - 91 points "Editors' Choice", Wine Enthusiast

This bubbly wine greets you with gentle floral notes of rose petals, strawberries and cream, and loads of freshly crushed red berries. The red fruits carry through the palate, where cranberry, peach, strawberry, and raspberry take center stage. There is a hint of toasty complexity and some creamy richness from time on lees that lead into a dry finish with lingering hints of spice.


1x McBride Sisters Collection Marlborough Pinot Gris 2020 - Winery direct only, not available in stores.

This perfect summer sipper is a very pale yellow with aromas of Bosc pear, crisp melon, mango, and sweet lemon, laced with light floral notes. Seamlessly woven palate with plenty of green apple freshness, tropical fruit juiciness, and perfectly balanced citrus flavors leading into a long finish. 

1x McBride Sisters Collection Marlborough Sauvignon Blanc 2021
Generous tropical fruits pair with lemongrass and citrus aromas. Ripe peach and mango aromas play with greener fruits like feijoa and Fuji apple. In the mouth, key lime flavors hang on a medium full, slightly oily body, which contrasts beautifully with the firm acidity and slightly mineral tone on the finish.

1x McBride Sisters Collection Central Coast Chardonnay 2020
Pale golden color. Aromas of lemon curd and honey, pineapple and ripe pear. Soft and balanced texture, with a slight hint of toasty oak that balances the palate and persists with the fruit. Complexity and character without weight. 

2x McBride Sisters Collection Central Coast Red Blend 2019- 91 points, Wine Enthusiast
Cherry and plum dominate the aromas, gently laced with cedar and vanilla.  In the mouth, the wine is elegant, even understated, with perfectly balanced tannin and just the slightest hint of earthiness complimenting the fruit. Extended oak aging softens the finish and brings with it a suggestion of baking spices and cocoa.

title: Fly Girl Luxe
description:
The perfect luxe wine pack for the fly girl who wants to try a little bit of everything. Bring the wine tasting experience home with an assortment of our McBride Sisters Collection Black Girl Magic Wines. We'd recommend starting with the bubbles and working your way down through the red wines. A taste of Black Girl Magic and the beauty of California wines!

Looking for our popular Brunch Recipe? CLICK HERE.

Want to mix up a few cocktails? DOWNLOAD RECIPES HERE.

This set includes one each of the following wines:

Black Girl Magic California Sparkling Brut NV
This wine is beautifully aromatic and refreshing with the perfect balance of lush fruit and delicate tart bubbles. There's lovely pineapple, melon and floral aromas on the nose with ripe pear, crisp apple, and white peach on the palate. 

Black Girl Magic California Riesling 2020
Intensely aromatic, this wine shows typical ripe Riesling characteristics, including honey, apricot, and white flowers. Tangerine, jasmine, and coriander seed appear in the nose, as the palate turns to tropical flavors evocative of guava and pineapple.

Black Girl Magic California Rosé 2020
This sophisticated dry Rosé has aromas of raspberry and orange blossom with delightful acidity and a mouthwatering fresh stone fruit and citrus palate.

Black Girl Magic California Merlot 2018
On the nose, black cherry and cocoa notes mingle with fresh raspberry and plum for an enticing, inviting
aroma laced with black tea leaves, toasty oak, and vanilla. Chocolate and cherry flavors persist in the mouth. Plush and luscious, the wine shows mild, silky tannins and a juicy palate that goes on and on.

Black Girl Magic California Zinfandel 2018
Intensely aromatic, this wine shows fresh plum, dried cherry, and crushed black pepper on the nose. Mellow oak notes suggest cigar box and a hint of spicy Madagascar vanilla. With bold flavors and plenty of generous fruit, the palate delivers berry jam and dried fig alongside subtle spice notes. Dried cherry and mild black peppercorn linger on the finish.

Black Girl Magic California Red Blend 2019

A complex, well-crafted and inviting wine that shows tobacco and vanilla bean notes alongside generous plum, raspberry, and blackberry. The ripe and juicy mouth offers the chocolate cherry flavors typical of Merlot blend with the peppery spice of Cabernet to round out the full body. The finish is bold, gripping, and invites another sip.

title: Gift Cards
description:
Give them what they really want: the wine of their choice!

This digital gift card gets emailed directly to your recipient's inbox with a personalized gift message from you.

  1. Enter the recipient's name and email in the Delivery Information.
  2. Add a personalized gift message.
  3. Once you check out, an e-gift card and code will automatically be emailed to them.

Prefer that the gift codes get emailed to you instead? Interested in purchasing multiple cards in a single transaction? Let us help in 3 easy steps!

  1. Create an account on our website, or login: HERE.
  2. Add your billing address and credit card to your new account.
  3. Email us at shop@mcbridesisters.com with your desired number of cards and the amount on each, and let us take care of the rest! We'll email you a list of codes privately so that you can share the gift cards when you're ready.

Expiration date: never.

title: Girls on the Town 12-Pack
description:
This season, we want to make sure you have a Black Girl Magic Wine for every occasion. This is the perfect pack for the fly girl hosting a luxe dinner or for the girl who just loves her wines!

Black Girl Magic New Zealand Sparkling Brut NV
Pear and candied lemon unite with soft gardenia on the nose. A fine, foamy mousse carries the palate and emphasizes a crisp, green apple flavor that marries perfectly with citrus and floral notes. 90.36% Chardonnay 9.64% Pinot Gris

Black Girl Magic California Riesling 2018
Intensely aromatic, this wine shows typical ripe Riesling characteristics, including honey, apricot, and white flowers. Tangerine, jasmine, and coriander seed appear in the nose, as the palate turns to tropical flavors evocative of guava and pineapple.

Black Girl Magic California Rosé 2019
This sophisticated dry Rosé has aromas of raspberry and orange blossom with delightful acidity and a mouthwatering fresh stone fruit and citrus palate.

Black Girl Magic California Merlot 2018
On the nose, black cherry and cocoa notes mingle with fresh raspberry and plum for an enticing, inviting
aroma laced with black tea leaves, toasty oak, and vanilla. Chocolate and cherry flavors persist in the mouth. Plush and luscious, the wine shows mild, silky tannins and a juicy palate that goes on and on.

As a newly bottled wine, we have found that it needs some time to reveal its full plush & jammy potential, so please give it a chance to settle into its best self! This bottle would be best opened 3-12 months from now but will age well for years to come.

Black Girl Magic California Zinfandel 2018
Intensely aromatic, this wine shows fresh plum, dried cherry, and crushed black pepper on the nose. Mellow oak notes suggest cigar box and a hint of spicy Madagascar vanilla. With bold flavors and plenty of generous fruit, the palate delivers berry jam and dried fig alongside subtle spice notes. Dried cherry and mild black peppercorn linger on the finish.

* Unfortunately, wine shipping is highly regulated and we are not able to ship our New Zealand wines to the following states: Connecticut, Iowa, Maine, Michigan and Missouri. Please check our store locator to find a retailer in your area.

title: Gold Coozie
Golden Coast Set
description:
Club Member Price: $152.97


Imagine the seaside cliffs of the iconic California Golden Coast as you sip through McBride Sisters Collection California Reserve wines. The limited edition, artisanal wines in our Golden Coast set will immerse you in the sun-kissed vineyards of the California Central Coast.

From one of California’s most prestigious wine regions, Paso Robles, the new McBride Sisters Collection Reserve White Wine “Abalone or Pāua?” is a blend of Grenache Blanc, Viognier and Marsanne, showcasing a creamy texture supported by firm acidity.

Our Reserve Chardonnay and Reserve Pinot Noir are from the Escolle Vineyard in Santa Lucia Highlands, Monterey County, California. The McBride Sisters Collection Reserve Chardonnay “The Great Escape” is a departure from the overly oaked style of many California Chardonnays. Get lost in the enticing aromas and flavors of lemon curd, green apple, pear & peach, beautifully balanced with subtle oak. The McBride Sisters Collection Reserve Pinot Noir “Cocky Motherf*cker”, awarded 91 points by Wine Enthusiast, exudes pure silk, opulent fruit notes and understated elegance.

title: Grill & Chill
description:
First we grill, then we chill. After a day full of grilling, pour your last glass for the evening, light up our limited edition candle and savor summer. Say hello to our Grill & Chill red wine summer bundle that will pair almost too well with your fresh off the grill favorites. With this wine pack, you'll receive a complimentary, limited edition Black Girl Magic Wines candle. 

Our go-to wine pairings?

A McBride family favorite. Our Black Girl Magic Merlot is an online exclusive that we enjoy the most when paired with a BBQ Bacon Cheeseburger, trust us on this one. If you're grilling up fresh Veggie Kabobs, reach for a bottle of our Black Girl Magic Zinfandel, also only available online & will be a game changer for your next family BBQ event. For our steak lovers, look no further than a bottle of McBride Sisters Collection Red Blend. Get all these wines + a complimentary Black Girl Magic Wines candle* right in time for summer. 

Black Girl Magic Wines Tropical Mango Candle* 13.5oz jar (11oz candle)
Top notes of peach, apple, orange, cassis, and citrus blossom into of mango, papaya, and pineapple. These tropical primary middle notes finish with a woody, amber, tonka and musk aroma for layers of complexity. Approximately 80 hours of burn time. Made with a soy wax blend with a lead-free cotton wick. Paraben-free, phthalate-free and vegan.

Summer birthdays? For the red wine lovers in your life, give them the gift of the Grill & Chill.

Welcome spring with our delicious in bloom wine bundle featuring white wines, rosé, pinot noir, and merlot. Perfect for sipping on the patio or pairing with fresh spring flavors, this bundle offers a diverse range of tastes and aromas. title: McBride Certified Tasting Pack
description:
A wine pack for the ultimate wine lover. A delicious step towards becoming McBride Certified, it's time to try a few of these wines and test out your training! 

—

1 x McBride Sisters Collection Central Coast California Chardonnay 2019
1 x McBride Sisters Collection Marlborough New Zealand* Sauvignon Blanc 2020
1 x McBride Sisters Collection Central Coast California Red Blend 2018
1 x Black Girl Magic California Sparkling Brut NV
1 x Black Girl Magic California Riesling 2020
1 x Black Girl Magic California Rosé 2020
1 x Black Girl Magic California Merlot 2018
1 x Black Girl Magic California Zinfandel 2018

McBride Sisters Collection Central Coast Chardonnay 2019
This isn’t your Grandmother’s or even your Mother’s Chardonnay! This fruit-driven wine will surprise you with pleasant notes of pineapple and pear, finishing up with flavors of crisp apple and zesty citrus.

McBride Sisters Collection Marlborough Sauvignon Blanc 2020
Generous tropical fruits pair with lemongrass and citrus aromas. Ripe peach and mango aromas play with greener fruits like feijoa and Fuji apple. In the mouth, key lime flavors hang on a medium full, slightly oily body, which contrasts beautifully with the firm acidity and slightly mineral tone on the finish.

McBride Sisters Collection Central Coast Red Blend 2018
Cherry and plum dominate the aromas, gently laced with cedar and vanilla.  In the mouth, the wine is elegant, even understated, with perfectly balanced tannin and just the slightest hint of earthiness complimenting the fruit. Extended oak aging softens the finish and brings with it a suggestion of baking spices and cocoa. 

Black Girl Magic California Sparkling Brut NV
This wine is beautifully aromatic and refreshing with the perfect balance of lush fruit and delicate tart bubbles. There's lovely pineapple, melon and floral aromas on the nose with ripe pear, crisp apple, and white peach on the palate. 

Black Girl Magic California Riesling 2020
Intensely aromatic, this wine shows typical ripe Riesling characteristics, including honey, apricot, and white flowers. Tangerine, jasmine, and coriander seed appear in the nose, as the palate turns to tropical flavors evocative of guava and pineapple.

Black Girl Magic California Rosé 2020
This sophisticated dry Rosé has aromas of raspberry and orange blossom with delightful acidity and a mouthwatering fresh stone fruit and citrus palate.

Black Girl Magic California Merlot 2018
On the nose, black cherry and cocoa notes mingle with fresh raspberry and plum for an enticing, inviting
aroma laced with black tea leaves, toasty oak, and vanilla. Chocolate and cherry flavors persist in the mouth. Plush and luscious, the wine shows mild, silky tannins and a juicy palate that goes on and on.

Black Girl Magic California Zinfandel 2018
Intensely aromatic, this wine shows fresh plum, dried cherry, and crushed black pepper on the nose. Mellow oak notes suggest cigar box and a hint of spicy Madagascar vanilla. With bold flavors and plenty of generous fruit, the palate delivers berry jam and dried fig alongside subtle spice notes. Dried cherry and mild black peppercorn linger on the finish.

* Unfortunately, wine shipping is highly regulated and we are not currently able to ship our New Zealand wines to the following states: Connecticut, Michigan, Missouri, Iowa, and Maine. Please check our store locator to find a store in your area.

title: McBride Certified Tasting Pack (without NZ wines) + Limited Edition Tasting Journal
description:
PRICE INCLUDES SHIPPING 


Level up the way you enjoy wine & become an expert in any situation!

Our best-selling Tasting Pack includes eight bottles of wine and a limited-edition "Be Rooted" Wine Journal, custom designed by Jasmin Foster. Combine this with our free Wine 101 online learning modules, and you've embarked on an amazing wine journey! 

Includes one each of the following:

  • McBride Sisters Collection Central Coast California Chardonnay 2019
  • McBride Sisters Collection Central Coast California Red Blend 2019
  • McBride Sisters Black Girl Magic California Sparkling Brut NV
  • McBride Sisters Black Girl Magic California Riesling 2020
  • McBride Sisters Black Girl Magic California Rosé 2020
  • McBride Sisters Black Girl Magic California Merlot 2018
  • McBride Sisters Black Girl Magic California Zinfandel 2018 
  • McBride Sisters Black Girl Magic California Red Blend 2019
  • McBride Sisters x Be Rooted Custom Wine Journal
  • Ground Shipping
About Be Rooted

Jasmin Foster founded Be Rooted to create a space for women of color to see themselves in a place they hadn’t been. Weaving culture into every design and message, Be Rooted inspires customers to explore their inner muse and celebrate self. Be Rooted in Culture. Be Rooted in Reflection. Be Rooted in Who You Are.

"From a design perspective, a part of Be Rooted's design aesthetic is to have designs that women of color can see themselves in. By leaving the faces as more of blank canvas, it allows people to not get so caught up in the intricate details of facial features and focus on the mood and feeling we are trying to evoke."

description:

13.5oz jar (11oz candle)

Created in partnership with The 125 Collection, a Black women-owned business based in Harlem, this is the perfect item for sending some magic to a friend, or even yourself!

title: McBride Sisters Collection  Reserve Chardonnay "The Great Escape" Santa Lucia Highlands, California 2019
description:
Club Member Price: $39.99

Showcasing superior character and style, this wine was awarded a 92-point score by Wine Enthusiast.

Journey to the prestigious Santa Lucia Highlands, where we sourced grapes from a very special vineyard and hand selected rows of vines for this first of its kind McBride Sisters Collection Reserve Chardonnay “The Great Escape” 2019. This wine is an escape from the overly oaked style of many California Chardonnays, and instead highlights the natural elegance and bright flavors of the Chardonnay grape. 

Get lost in the enticing aromas and flavors of lemon curd, green apple, pear & peach, beautifully balanced with subtle oak. The crisp acidity from the cool climate in Monterey, California is reminiscent of the great French Chardonnays from southern Burgundy. 

“When I was a baby, my mom drove our bright red Volkswagen bug up the Pacific Coast Highway from LA to a small town called Monterey. This is where I fell in love with vineyards and winemaking.”
- Robin McBride 


Both of the new Reserve Wines are available in our California Reserve Wines Set which includes the Reserve Chardonnay and Reserve Pinot Noir — available here. This set also includes a recording of our Reserve Wines Virtual Tasting for you to watch while you taste the wines. Our set makes a perfect wedding or birthday gift for the wine lovers in your life!

description:
Cherry and plum dominate the aromas, gently laced with cedar and vanilla. In the mouth, the wine is elegant, even understated, with perfectly balanced tannin and just the slightest hint of earthiness complimenting the fruit. Extended oak aging softens the finish and brings with it a suggestion of baking spices and cocoa.A well-rounded wine, great with roast chicken, pork, beef and vegetable dishes. Perfect with a lightly sauced sausage ravioli, or even on its own with great conversation.

67% Merlot 33% Cabernet Sauvignon

title: McBride Sisters Collection 2018 Marlborough New Zealand Sauvignon Blanc
description: One sip of this delicate, citrusy Sauvignon Blanc and you’ll be immediately transported to New Zealand. It has notes of grapefruit and nectarine with the perfect amount of acidity to cool you off on a warm summer’s day.

title: McBride Sisters Collection 2019 Marlborough New Zealand Sauvignon Blanc
description:
Generous tropical fruits pair with lemongrass and citrus aromas. Ripe peach and mango aromas play with greener fruits like feijoa and Fuji apple. In the mouth, key lime flavors hang on a medium full, slightly oily body, which contrasts beautifully with the firm acidity and slightly mineral tone on the finish. 

Grown sustainably in Marlborough, New Zealand. Pairs beautifully with fresh oysters or a spicy Asian stir-fry, especially one with lots of fresh herbs like mint, cilantro, and basil.

Don’t forget to check our Sauvignon Blanc guidelines and get the best taste out of it!

94 Points | Platinum Medal | Monterey International Wine Competition

title: McBride Sisters Collection 3-bottle Gift Box Abalone

McBride Sisters Collection BeRooted Limited Edition Wine Journal
description:
Our best selling Tasting Pack, now including a complimentary, limited edition Wine Journal. Take notes while you sip in our one-of-a-kind McBride Sisters x Be Rooted notebook. Level up the way you wine taste & become an expert in any wine situation!

About Be Rooted:

Jasmin Foster founded Be Rooted to create a space for women of color to see themselves in a place they hadn’t been. Weaving culture into every design and message, Be Rooted inspires customers to explore their inner muse and celebrate self. Be Rooted in Culture. Be Rooted in Reflection. Be Rooted in Who You Are.

"From a design perspective, a part of Be Rooted's design aesthetic is to have designs that women of color can see themselves in. By leaving the faces as more of blank canvas, it allows people to not get so caught up in the intricate details of facial features and focus on the mood and feeling we are trying to evoke."

The Wine Journal: The perfect place to keep track of your 5 S's while tasting (See, Swirl, Sniff, Sip, Savor). Haven't learned about the 5 S's yet? Join our McBride Certified: Wine 101 course and use the wines in this Tasting Pack to sip along with us.

McBride Sisters Collection BGM Riesling TEST FUTURE SHIP DATE
description: Intensely aromatic, this wine shows typical ripe Riesling characteristics, including honey, apricot, and white flowers. Tangerine, jasmine, and coriander seed appear in the nose, as the palate turns to tropical flavors evocative of guava and pineapple. Mild sweetness is balanced by a bright core of tangy citrus for a mouth-watering, sweet and sour finish.

title: McBride Sisters Collection Black Girl Magic 2016 California Red Blend
description: A complex, well-crafted and inviting wine that shows tobacco and vanilla bean notes alongside generous plum, raspberry, and blackberry. The ripe and juicy mouth offers the chocolate cherry flavors typical of Merlot with the full body and peppery spice of Cabernet to round out the full body and complement the fruit. The finish is bold, gripping, and invites another sip.

title: McBride Sisters Collection Black Girl Magic 2017 California Red Blend
description:
Beautiful rich garnet in color. Fruit-forward, with essences of black cherry and fleshy red plum. Smooth, voluptuous, and full-bodied, the flavors carry the cherry and plum of the nose with added cedar, vanilla, and the subtle evidence of extended oak aging. The finish is round and luxurious with layers of perfectly balanced tannin on lush fruit.

This is a perfect date night wine. Pairs easily with a steak dinner, grilled chicken, or even baked pasta. Drinks well in the bathtub too.

90 Points | Gold Medal | San Diego International Wine & Spirits Competition

title: McBride Sisters Collection Black Girl Magic 2018 California Red Blend
description:
Find This Wine In Stores

A gorgeous red wine with fruit-forward aromas of black cherry and fleshy red plum. It's smooth, full-bodied palate has continuing notes of cherry and plum with added cedar and vanilla, from the extended oak aging. The finish is round and luxurious with layers of perfectly balanced tannin on lush fruit.

This is a perfect date night wine. Pairs easily with a steak dinner, grilled chicken, or even baked pasta. Drinks well in the bathtub too.

2017 Black Girl Magic Red Blend - 90 Points | Gold Medal | San Diego International Wine & Spirits Competition

title: McBride Sisters Collection Black Girl Magic 2018 California Red Blend
description:
Black Girl Magic is more than a phrase. It’s a feeling. A look. A taste. Our Black Girl Magic collection is an ode to our culture and story, inspired by the magic and resilience of Black women, to be enjoyed by all.

A complex, well-crafted and inviting wine that shows tobacco and vanilla bean notes alongside generous plum, raspberry, and blackberry. The ripe and juicy mouth offers the chocolate cherry flavors typical of Merlot blend with the peppery spice of Cabernet to round out the full body. The finish is bold, gripping, and invites another sip.

title: McBride Sisters Collection Black Girl Magic 2018 California Riesling
description:
Intensely aromatic, this wine shows typical ripe Riesling characteristics, including honey, apricot, and white flowers. Refreshing when ice cold, it opens up as it sits in the glass – tangerine, jasmine, and coriander seed appear in the nose, as the palate turns to tropical flavors evocative of guava and pineapple. Mild sweetness is balanced by a bright core of tangy citrus for a mouth-watering finish. The result is elegant and complex. Wine like you.

Pairs perfectly with a spicy seafood pasta, seasoned chicken dishes or your favorite charcuterie board. This wine is best enjoyed chilled. 

ACCOLADES


Voted Best Riesling | 94 Points | Platinum Medal | San Diego International Wine & Spirits Competition 2020

The Fifty Best Rieslings | Gold Medal | The Fifty Best Competition 2020

Wine + Feelin' Myself Set Pairing Guide | Recipes curated to pair perfectly with these wines... We're talkin' Cardamom French Toast Bake, Thai Coconut Curry & more. Get the guide here.

_

1x McBride Sisters Collection Hawke's Bay New Zealand Sparkling Brut NV - 91 points "Editors' Choice", Wine Enthusiast

This bubbly wine greets you with gentle floral notes of rose petals, strawberries and cream, and loads of freshly crushed red berries. The red fruits carry through the palate, where cranberry, peach, strawberry, and raspberry take center stage. There is a hint of toasty complexity and some creamy richness from time on lees that lead into a dry finish with lingering hints of spice.


1x McBride Sisters Collection Marlborough Pinot Gris 2020 - Winery direct only, not available in stores.

This perfect summer sipper is a very pale yellow with aromas of Bosc pear, crisp melon, mango, and sweet lemon, laced with light floral notes. Seamlessly woven palate with plenty of green apple freshness, tropical fruit juiciness, and perfectly balanced citrus flavors leading into a long finish. 

1x McBride Sisters Collection Marlborough Sauvignon Blanc 2020
Generous tropical fruits pair with lemongrass and citrus aromas. Ripe peach and mango aromas play with greener fruits like feijoa and Fuji apple. In the mouth, key lime flavors hang on a medium full, slightly oily body, which contrasts beautifully with the firm acidity and slightly mineral tone on the finish.

1x McBride Sisters Collection Central Coast Chardonnay 2019
Pale golden color. Aromas of lemon curd and honey, pineapple and ripe pear. Soft and balanced texture, with a slight hint of toasty oak that balances the palate and persists with the fruit. Complexity and character without weight. 

2x McBride Sisters Collection Central Coast Red Blend 2019- 91 points, Wine Enthusiast
Cherry and plum dominate the aromas, gently laced with cedar and vanilla.  In the mouth, the wine is elegant, even understated, with perfectly balanced tannin and just the slightest hint of earthiness complimenting the fruit. Extended oak aging softens the finish and brings with it a suggestion of baking spices and cocoa.

McBride Sisters Collection Reserve Chardonnay "The Great Escape" Santa Lucia Highlands, California 2020
description:
Club Member Price: $44.99
Awarded 90 Points in 2022 by Wine Enthusiast

Explore the prestigious Santa Lucia Highlands, where we hand selected rows of vines for this exclusive McBride Sisters Collection Reserve Chardonnay “The Great Escape” 2020. This wine is an escape from the overly oaked style of many California Chardonnays and highlights the natural elegance and bright flavors of the grape.

The enticing aromas and flavors of lemon curd, pear, peach and green apple are beautifully balanced with toasty oak. This Chardonnay is clean and bright with a hint of creaminess on the nose. The crisp acidity from the cool climate in Monterey, California is reminiscent of the great French Chardonnays from southern Burgundy. An exceptional expression of Santa Lucia Highlands fruit character.

“When I was a baby, my mom drove our bright red Volkswagen bug up the Pacific Coast Highway from LA to a small town called Monterey. This is where I fell in love with vineyards and winemaking.”
- Robin McBride 


Don't forget to rate us on Vivino!

title: McBride Sisters Collection Reserve Gamay "Rebels" Central Otago, New Zealand 2020
description:
Transport to Aotearoa New Zealand*, with the McBride Sisters Collection New Zealand Reserve Gamay "Rebels" where there are more than 25 million sheep roaming the land. Consistent to its demographics, a small percentage of sheep in Aotearoa are black, similar to how the McBride Sisters felt when first building the company. The Reserve Gamay is dedicated to finding success by breaking the rules. 

The grapes are from a single vineyard in Bannockburn, a sub-region of Central Otago, and were hand harvested and destemmed prior to fermentation with wild yeast. The wine was hand plunged and aged in 60% neutral French oak barrels and 40% stainless steel tanks. It's unfined and unfiltered. 

A vibrant dry wine, this complex expression of Gamay has a bright ruby color and a savory black pepper element underpinning its fruit-forward core. 

"From the beginning, Robin and I rebelled against the status quo of ‘how the industry works.’ This Reserve Gamay is an ode to the rebels who see things differently." - Andréa McBride John

*Attention CT, IA, ME, MI and MO residents: State laws prohibit us from directly shipping our New Zealand wines to you.

McBride Sisters Collection Reserve Pinot Noir "Papatūānuku" Central Otago, New Zealand 2019
description:
Awarded 92 Points in 2022 by Wine Enthusiast.

Experience the strong bond to land and "Mother Earth" with the first ever McBride Sisters Collection New Zealand Reserve Pinot Noir “Papatūānuku”. Inspired by Aotearoa New Zealand, where Andréa grew up splitting time between her mother’s family and her Māori foster family, this wine showcases the rich history of the soil in the Central Otago region of Aotearoa New Zealand.

Grown in the Bannockburn, Gibbston and Pisa sub-regions of Central Otago, the grapes were hand harvested and 80% were de-stemmed, contributing vibrant fruit flavors. Twenty percent were fermented in whole bunches to give the wine greater complexity. The grapes were fermented using wild yeast and hand plunged daily. The wine was aged in French oak barrels, 15% of which were new, and is unfined and unfiltered.

This Pinot Noir is medium-bodied and has a gentle oak influence that blends with exciting ripe aromas of cherry, strawberry, and plum. Subtle minerality balances the fruit on the palate, making it an outstanding example of Central Otago Pinot Noir.

“The indigenous Māori people have strong spiritual bonds to the land, and to Papatūānuku—Mother Earth —who sustains all life. Our Central Otago Reserve Pinot Noir is inspired by this bond, and dedicated to the stewardship of humanity and the environment." - Andréa McBride John

*Attention CT, IA, ME, MI and MO residents: State laws prohibit us from directly shipping our New Zealand wines to you.

title: McBride Sisters Collection Reserve Santa Lucia Highlands Chardonnay 2018
description:
“When I was a baby, my mom drove our bright red Volkswagen bug up the Pacific Coast Highway from LA to a small town called Monterey. This is where I fell in love with vineyards and winemaking.”
- Robin McBride 
"The Great Escape"

The Reserve Chardonnay is an escape from the overly oaked style of many California Chardonnays, and instead highlights the natural elegance and bright flavors of the Chardonnay grape.  This wine is barrel fermented and aged on the lees for 10 months in 33% new French oak. 

This wine is pale straw yellow with a slight hint of gold.  On the nose, fresh lemon and lime zest meet tropical notes of golden kiwi and ripe pineapple, laced gracefully with a touch of toasty oak.  On the palate you’ll find crisp Golden Delicious apple and creamy lemon curd that explores exceptional length, illustrating the unique power of Santa Lucia Highlands Chardonnay. 

Every sip is a journey to the prestigious Santa Lucia Highlands, where we sourced grapes from hand-selected rows of vines for this first of its kind McBride Sisters Collection Reserve Chardonnay.  The crisp acidity from the cool climate in Monterey, California is reminiscent of the great French Chardonnays from southern Burgundy. 

Drink now through 2025.  Only 146 cases made.

title: McBride Sisters Collection Reserve White Wine “Abalone or Pāua?” Paso Robles, California 2020
description:
Club Member Price: $44.99

From one of California’s most prestigious wine regions, the McBride Sisters Collection Reserve White “Abalone or Pāua?”is a blend of Grenache Blanc, Viognier and Marsanne, showcasing a creamy texture supported by firm acidity.

Located on the Eastern side of the Santa Lucia Mountain range, Paso Robles boasts scenic rolling hills that soak up the California sunshine. The Adelaida District sub-appellation benefits from its proximity to the Pacific Ocean, which lends freshness and structure to wines from this area.

The soil across the 26,000 acres of vineyards in Paso Robles is mostly shale and limestone, closely resembling the soils of Southern Rhône, and making it ideal for growing white Rhône varietals like Grenache Blanc, Viognier and Marsanne.

Grenache Blanc provides the acid backbone, crystalline purity and drive of the blend. Viognier, both highly aromatic and texturally engaging, adds floral and apricot aromas as well as weight and body to the palate, while Marsanne contributes a slate-like character to the finish.

“Growing up an ocean apart in Monterey, California and Marlborough, Aotearoa New Zealand, Andréa and I were fascinated by Abalone shells, called Pāua in Māori, that could be found near our childhood homes. The label art pays tribute to these iridescent and vibrant shells, and the unique soil of the vineyards for our Reserve White Wine, which were once an ocean floor. This Reserve tastes like the moment you come back home, no matter how far you came.”
-Robin McBride

Our Island Citrus Dry Rosé Wine Spritzer was made for any occasion, location, or mood. It's your favorite Cali Rosé (ours!) remixed with notes of tropical grapefruit, guava, and golden kiwi and bubbles give it a bright, refreshing with none of the stuff you don't want! No added sugar, no artificial flavors, or colors. Less than 70 calories and only 1g carb per serving.

Perfect for whatever, whenever!

title: McBride Sisters Collection SHE CAN New Zealand Sauvignon Blanc
description: Classic New Zealand Sauvignon Blanc in a can! SHE CAN Sauvignon Blanc treats you with tropical aromas and juicy citrus. Upon your first sip you’ll be enjoying flavors of fresh kiwi, white fig and cut grass.

title: McBride Sisters Collection Sparkling Brut Rosé & Black Girl Magic Rosé Mixed 6 Pack
description:
Having to decide between a sparkling rosé and still rosé is a decision we don't want to make. Our best selling McBride Sisters Collection Sparkling Brut Rosé from Hawke's Bay, New Zealand is finally back & ready for summertime sipping! We've paired it this season with the ever popular, refreshing and must have McBride Sisters Collection Black Girl Magic Rosé. Enjoy these wines poolside in your favorite suit or at your next family BBQ.

Hawke’s Bay is one of the most prestigious fine wine regions in New Zealand and the source for our delicious non-vintage Sparkling Brut Rosé. Pear and candied lemon unite with soft gardenia on the nose. A fine, foamy mousse carries the palate and emphasizes a crisp, green apple flavor that marries perfectly with the citrus and floral notes. The long, quenching finish invites another sip. Our award winning Black Girl Magic Rosé has aromas of raspberry and orange blossom with delightful acidity and a mouthwatering fresh stone fruit and citrus palate.

title: McBride Sisters Collection Sparkling Brut Rosé Hawke's Bay New Zealand NV
description:
Awarded 92 Points by Wine Spectator.


" alt="" data-mce-src="/

">Hawke’s Bay is one of the most prestigious fine wine regions in New Zealand*. This bubbly wine greets you with gentle floral notes of rose petals, strawberries and cream, and loads of freshly crushed red berries. There is a hint of toasty complexity and some creamy richness from time on lees that lead into a dry finish with lingering hints of spice.

Don't forget to rate us on Vivino!

McBride Sisters Juneteenth Set
description:
On June 19, 1865, enslaved African-Americans in Galveston, Texas, were told they were free. A century and a half later, people in cities and towns across the U.S. continue to celebrate the occasion. Juneteenth today celebrates African American freedom and achievement, while encouraging continuous self-development and respect for all cultures.

This is how we Juneteenth:
Embrace the Soul And Celebrate Black Culture. The Cookout Pack features the following Black Girl Magic wines and cans to pair with your celebrations this holiday.

1x Black Girl Magic Sparkling Brut, California, NV
1x Black Girl Magic Riesling, California, 2020
1x Black Girl Magic Rosé, California, 2020
3x Black Girl Magic Bubbly Red, NV
3x Black Girl Magic Bubbly Rosé, NV

Take the cookout to the next level with the Summer's Gift cocktail featuring our Black Girl Magic Wines Red Blend

Naughty or Nice Trio
description:
PRICE INCLUDES CUSTOM GIFT BOX & GROUND SHIPPING

Be naughty and nice with this seductive and elegant trio for the red wine lover. 

McBride Sisters Collection Black Girl Magic 2018 California Merlot

Stunning garnet red. Enticing black cherry and warm cocoa aromas are mixed with fresh raspberry and plum on the nose. As the wine opens up, the nose evolves into toasty oak, vanilla and black tea leaves. Chocolate and cherry follow you into the palate with luscious and silky tannins. This juicy and sensational wine is a classic Merlot, sophisticated for the wine connoisseur and delicious for the wine novices.

McBride Sisters Collection Black Girl Magic 2018 California Zinfandel

Lovely purple-tinged ruby red. Intensely aromatic with gorgeous fresh plum, dried cherry, and delicate crushed black pepper followed by soft oak notes and a hint of spicy Madagascar vanilla. This wine has a generously fruit-forward palate with bold flavors, berry jam, and dried fig with a grand finale of dried cherry and subtle peppercorn.

McBride Sisters Collection Black Girl Magic 2019 California Red Blend

Cherry and plum dominate the aromas, gently laced with cedar and vanilla. In the mouth, the wine is elegant, even understated, with perfectly balanced tannin and just the slightest hint of earthiness complimenting the fruit. Extended oak aging softens the finish and brings with it a suggestion of baking spices and cocoa.

Gift set includes:
1 x McBride Sisters Collection Black Girl Magic 2018 California Merlot
1 x McBride Sisters Collection Black Girl Magic 2018 California Zinfandel
1 x McBride Sisters Collection Black Girl Magic 2019 California Red Blend
Shipped in a luxe three-bottle, ready-to-give gift box

title: New Girls In Town 12-Pack
description:
Pre-Order now for Zinfandel Day! Wines will ship the week of November 30th.

6 x McBride Sisters Collection Zinfandel 2018
6 x McBride Sisters Collection Merlot 2018

100% Zinfandel. Our first Zinfandel in the Black Girl Magic wine family. This wine is beautifully aromatic with fresh plum, dried cherry with a hint of spicy Madagascar vanilla. The stunning jammy notes and spice will pair beautifully with any holiday feast, beef brisket or lasagna. 

Drinks well in front of a warm fireplace.

Our first ever 100% Merlot. This smooth wine has warm aromas of black cherry and cocoa with ripe plum on the nose. The delicious chocolate and cherry follow you into the palate with silky tannins and a subtle dry finish. The perfect pairing for your seasoned lamb chops, mashed potatoes or a scoop of your favorite chocolate ice cream. 

A crowd pleaser and showstopper.

As a newly bottled wine, we have found that it needs some time to reveal its full plush & jammy potential, so please give it a chance to settle into its best self! This bottle would be best opened 3-12 months from now but will age well for years to come.

title: New Zealand Reserves Set
description:
Club Member Price: $125.98
 

From Central Otago in Aotearoa New Zealand, our Reserve Pinot Noir and Reserve Gamay are sourced from some of the southernmost vineyards in the world.

The Gamay grapes are from a single vineyard in Bannockburn, while the Pinot Noir was grown in the Bannockburn, Gibbston and Pisa sub-regions of Central Otago. All the grapes were hand harvested and fermented using wild yeast. 

The Reserve Pinot Noir “Papatūānuku” embodies vibrant fruit flavors, while the label tells the story of Andréa's Māori foster family, and the cultures and traditions they cherished. The Reserve Gamay "Rebels", inspired by the McBride Sisters’ dedication to finding success in their own way, expresses vibrant fruit flavors and a long, savory finish. 

*Attention CT, IA, ME, MI and MO residents: State laws prohibit us from directly shipping our New Zealand wines to you.

title: Rebellious Reds Set
description:
Club Member Price: $188.97

Each of these Reserve red wines is a rebel in its own way. Our McBride Sisters Collection Reserve Pinot Noir “Cocky Motherf*cker”, a wine inspired by Robin and Andréa’s father, expresses its unusual name through an image of a peacock with an Afro. From the Escolle Vineyard in Santa Lucia Highlands, this wine exudes pure silk, opulent fruit notes and understated elegance. 

The Reserve Gamay "Rebels", from Central Otago in Aotearoa New Zealand, was inspired by Robin and Andréa rebelling against the status quo when starting their wine company. Also, Gamay represents less than 1% of the wine produced in Aotearoa New Zealand. This complex expression of the Gamay grape has vibrant fruit flavors and a long, savory finish.

Papatūānuku is the Māori word for Mother Earth, and our Reserve Pinot Noir “Papatūānuku”label represents the spirit of the indigenous Māori people, who have sustained their cherished culture and traditions into modern times. This wine’s minerality balances the fruit on the palate, making it an outstanding example of Central Otago Pinot Noir.

*Attention CT, IA, ME, MI and MO residents: State laws prohibit us from directly shipping our New Zealand wines to you.

title: Red Red (Red) Wine
description:
PRICE INCLUDES CUSTOM GIFT BOX 

McBride Sisters Collection Black Girl Magic 2018 California Merlot

Stunning garnet red. Enticing black cherry and warm cocoa aromas are mixed with fresh raspberry and plum on the nose. As the wine opens up, the nose evolves into toasty oak, vanilla and black tea leaves. Chocolate and cherry follow you into the palate with luscious and silky tannins. This juicy and sensational wine is a classic Merlot, sophisticated for the wine connoisseur and delicious for the wine novices.

McBride Sisters Collection Black Girl Magic 2018 California Zinfandel

Lovely purple-tinged ruby red. Intensely aromatic with gorgeous fresh plum, dried cherry, and delicate crushed black pepper followed by soft oak notes and a hint of spicy Madagascar vanilla. This wine has a generously fruit-forward palate with bold flavors, berry jam, and dried fig with a grand finale of dried cherry and subtle peppercorn.

McBride Sisters Collection Black Girl Magic 2019 California Red Blend

Cherry and plum dominate the aromas, gently laced with cedar and vanilla. In the mouth, the wine is elegant, even understated, with perfectly balanced tannin and just the slightest hint of earthiness complimenting the fruit. Extended oak aging softens the finish and brings with it a suggestion of baking spices and cocoa.

SHE CAN 4-Pack Sampler
SHE CAN 4-Pack Sampler
description:
Yes SHE CAN have it all! Enjoy our most popular sampler including one of each flavor. Four cans is the equivalent of two bottles of wine and an amazing value for these delicious wines and spritzers.

SHE CAN California Rosé Wine
This sophisticated dry rosé from the Central Coast of California has refreshing aromatics and flavors of white florals and ripe raspberry. Orange and mandarin zests complement the chalky earth notes. Delightful acidity gives a mouthwatering fresh stone fruit and citrus finish. 45% Pinot Noir 32% Merlot 23% Zinfandel

SHE CAN New Zealand Sauvignon* Blanc
Generous tropical fruits pair with lemongrass and citrus. Ripe peach and mango aromas play with greener fruits like feijoa and Fuji apple. In the mouth, key lime flavors hang on a medium full, slightly oily body, which contrasts beautifully with the firm acidity and slightly mineral tone on the finish. Pairs beautifully with fresh oysters or a spicy Asian stir-fry, especially one with lots of fresh herbs like mint, cilantro, and basil. 100% Sauvignon Blanc. Check the Sauvignon Blanc guidelines and get the best taste out of it!

SHE CAN Island Citrus Dry Rosé Spritzer
No added sugar, no artificial flavors, or colors. Less than 70 calories and only 1g carb per serving. This sophisticated dry rosé spritzer has refreshing notes of ripe grapefruit, guava, and golden kiwi. Plentiful bubbles give our Island Citrus Spritzer a crisp, refreshing finish.

SHE CAN Coastal Berry Dry Rosé Spritzer
No added sugar, no artificial flavors, or colors. Less than 70 calories and only 1g carb per serving. This sophisticated dry rosé spritzer has refreshing aromatics and flavors of ripe blackberry and raspberry. Plentiful bubbles give our Coastal Berry Spritzer a crisp, refreshing finish.

title: Spring Vibes 12-Pack
description:
One bottle for you, one bottle for them! Give it as a gift, or treat yourself. Whether you're enjoying a picnic at the park or starting your happy hour a little early — these wines will always show up for you. An ideal mixed case of six red wines and six white wines from the McBride Sisters Collection and Black Girl Magic Wines. 

Giving this as a gift? Add your personalized message at check out and it will print onto a packing slip, no prices will be shown. If you'd prefer to include our beautiful greeting card, this can be added separately: click here.

—

2 x McBride Sisters Collection Central Coast California Chardonnay 2019
2 x McBride Sisters Collection Central Coast California Red Blend 2018
2 x Black Girl Magic California Sparkling Brut NV
2 x Black Girl Magic California Riesling 2018
2 x Black Girl Magic California Merlot 2018
2 x Black Girl Magic California Zinfandel 2018

McBride Sisters Collection Central Coast Chardonnay 2019
This isn’t your Grandmother’s or even your Mother’s Chardonnay! This fruit-driven wine will surprise you with pleasant notes of pineapple and pear, finishing up with flavors of crisp apple and zesty citrus.

McBride Sisters Collection Central Coast Red Blend 2018
Cherry and plum dominate the aromas, gently laced with cedar and vanilla. In the mouth, the wine is elegant, even understated, with perfectly balanced tannin and just the slightest hint of earthiness complimenting the fruit. Extended oak aging softens the finish and brings with it a suggestion of baking spices and cocoa. 67% Merlot 33% Cabernet Sauvignon

Black Girl Magic California Sparkling Brut NV
This wine is beautifully aromatic and refreshing with the perfect balance of lush fruit and delicate tart bubbles. There's lovely pineapple, melon and floral aromas on the nose with ripe pear, crisp apple, and white peach on the palate.

Black Girl Magic California Riesling 2018
Intensely aromatic, this wine shows typical ripe Riesling characteristics, including honey, apricot, and white flowers. Tangerine, jasmine, and coriander seed appear in the nose, as the palate turns to tropical flavors evocative of guava and pineapple.

Black Girl Magic California Merlot 2018
On the nose, black cherry and cocoa notes mingle with fresh raspberry and plum for an enticing, inviting
aroma laced with black tea leaves, toasty oak, and vanilla. Chocolate and cherry flavors persist in the mouth. Plush and luscious, the wine shows mild, silky tannins and a juicy palate that goes on and on.

As a newly bottled wine, we have found that it needs some time to reveal its full plush & jammy potential, so please give it a chance to settle into its best self! This bottle would be best opened 3-12 months from now but will age well for years to come.

Black Girl Magic California Zinfandel 2018
Intensely aromatic, this wine shows fresh plum, dried cherry, and crushed black pepper on the nose. Mellow oak notes suggest cigar box and a hint of spicy Madagascar vanilla. With bold flavors and plenty of generous fruit, the palate delivers berry jam and dried fig alongside subtle spice notes. Dried cherry and mild black peppercorn linger on the finish.

title: The Pinnacles Set
description:
Club Member Price: $107.98

Journey to an exceptional vineyard in the prestigious Santa Lucia Highlands, just down the road from the towering rock formations of Pinnacles National Park, where we hand selected rows of vines for our McBride Sisters Collection Reserve Wines.

Our Reserve Chardonnay and Reserve Pinot Noir come from the Escolle Vineyard in Santa Lucia Highlands, Monterey County, California. Our McBride Sisters Collection Reserve Chardonnay “The Great Escape” embodies bright acidity and a cool climate sophistication, while the label tells the story of Robin and her mother’s journey to their new home. McBride Sisters Collection Reserve Pinot Noir “Cocky Motherf*cker”, a wine inspired by Robin and Andréa’s father, exudes pure silk, opulent fruit notes and understated elegance.

The 2019 vintage of Reserve Pinot Noir was awarded 91 Points by Wine Enthusiast.

title: 'tis the Season Duo
Toast To Mom
description:
It's a McBride Mother's Day! Join Robin & her daughter Daneia as they mix up some Black Girl Magic Wines x Grand Marnier cocktail recipes to celebrate the day!

DOWNLOAD THE RECIPES:

Black Girl Magic Wines x Grand Marnier Mother's Day Recipes Here

SIP WITH US:

Cocktail event with Daneia & Robin

Friday May 7th, 2021

2:30pm PST/5:30pm EST on Instagram Live

_______

In this four pack of wines you'll receive:

McBride Sisters Collection Black Girl Magic Sparkling Brut (2x)

This wine is beautifully aromatic and refreshing with the perfect balance of lush fruit and delicate tart bubbles. There's lovely pineapple, melon and floral aromas on the nose with ripe pear, crisp apple, and white peach on the palate.

McBride Sisters Collection Black Girl Magic Riesling (2x)

Intensely aromatic, this wine shows typical ripe Riesling characteristics, including honey, apricot, and white flowers. Tangerine, jasmine, and coriander seed appear in the nose, as the palate turns to tropical flavors evocative of guava and pineapple. Mild sweetness is balanced by a bright core of tangy citrus for a mouth-watering, sweet and sour finish.

90 Points | Gold Medal | Monterey International Wine Competition 2021

title: Travis Smith Total Wines Special Order
Twitter Holiday Pack
Twitter Holiday Pack 2022
Two Hemispheres Reserves Set
description:
Club Member Price: $278.96

A reflection of the Sisters’ history in the Central Coast of California and the South Island of Aotearoa New Zealand, our McBride Sisters Collection Reserve Wines are an ode to Robin and Andréa’s personal stories. The Two Hemispheres Reserves Set will take you on a wine journey across two continents.

California

From one of California’s most prestigious wine regions, Paso Robles, the new McBride Sisters Collection Reserve White Wine “Abalone or Pāua?” is a blend of Grenache Blanc, Viognier and Marsanne, showcasing a creamy texture supported by firm acidity. Our Reserve Chardonnay and Reserve Pinot Noir are from the Escolle Vineyard in Santa Lucia Highlands, Monterey County, California. The McBride Sisters Collection Reserve Chardonnay “The Great Escape” is a departure from the overly oaked style of many California Chardonnays. Get lost in the enticing aromas and flavors of lemon curd, green apple, pear & peach, beautifully balanced with subtle oak. The McBride Sisters Collection Reserve Pinot Noir “Cocky Motherf*cker”, awarded 91 points by Wine Enthusiast, exudes pure silk, opulent fruit notes and understated elegance.

New Zealand*

From Central Otago in Aotearoa New Zealand, our Reserve Pinot Noir and Reserve Gamay come from some of the southernmost vineyards in the world.

The McBride Sisters Collection Reserve Gamay "Rebels” is a vibrant dry wine, with a bright ruby color and a savory black pepper element underpinning its fruit-forward core.

The McBride Sisters Collection Reserve Pinot Noir “Papatūānuku” embodies vibrant fruit flavors, while the label tells the story of Andréa's Māori foster family, and the cultures and traditions they cherished. 

*CT, IA, ME, MI and MO residents: We are prohibited from directly shipping our New Zealand wines to your state. Please check our store locator to find a retailer in your area.

title: White Sizzle
Wine Club Welcome Six Pack
Wine Club Welcome Six Pack
WineDirect Greeting Card CHEERS WITH WINE COLLAGE
Winter Vibes 12-Pack
description:
One for you, one for them! The perfect mixed case for every occasion. Give it as a gift, or treat yourself — we can still spoil ourselves in 2020, right?

Giving this as a gift? Add your personalized message at check out and it will print onto a packing slip, no prices will be shown. If you'd prefer to include our beautiful greeting card, this can be added separately: click here.

—

2 x McBride Sisters Collection Central Coast California Chardonnay 2018
2 x McBride Sisters Collection Central Coast California Red Blend 2017
2 x Black Girl Magic New Zealand* Sparkling Brut NV
2 x Black Girl Magic California Riesling 2018
2 x Black Girl Magic California Merlot 2018
2 x Black Girl Magic California Zinfandel 2018

McBride Sisters Collection Central Coast Chardonnay 2018
This isn’t your Grandmother’s or even your Mother’s Chardonnay! This fruit-driven wine will surprise you with pleasant notes of pineapple and pear, finishing up with flavors of crisp apple and zesty citrus.

McBride Sisters Collection Central Coast Red Blend 2017
Cherry and plum dominate the aromas, gently laced with cedar and vanilla. In the mouth, the wine is elegant, even understated, with perfectly balanced tannin and just the slightest hint of earthiness complimenting the fruit. Extended oak aging softens the finish and brings with it a suggestion of baking spices and cocoa. 67% Merlot 33% Cabernet Sauvignon

Black Girl Magic New Zealand Sparkling Brut NV
Pear and candied lemon unite with soft gardenia on the nose. A fine, foamy mousse carries the palate and emphasizes a crisp, green apple flavor that marries perfectly with citrus and floral notes. 90.36% Chardonnay 9.64% Pinot Gris

Black Girl Magic California Riesling 2018
Intensely aromatic, this wine shows typical ripe Riesling characteristics, including honey, apricot, and white flowers. Tangerine, jasmine, and coriander seed appear in the nose, as the palate turns to tropical flavors evocative of guava and pineapple.

Black Girl Magic California Merlot 2018
On the nose, black cherry and cocoa notes mingle with fresh raspberry and plum for an enticing, inviting
aroma laced with black tea leaves, toasty oak, and vanilla. Chocolate and cherry flavors persist in the mouth. Plush and luscious, the wine shows mild, silky tannins and a juicy palate that goes on and on.

As a newly bottled wine, we have found that it needs some time to reveal its full plush & jammy potential, so please give it a chance to settle into its best self! This bottle would be best opened 3-12 months from now but will age well for years to come.

Black Girl Magic California Zinfandel 2018
Intensely aromatic, this wine shows fresh plum, dried cherry, and crushed black pepper on the nose. Mellow oak notes suggest cigar box and a hint of spicy Madagascar vanilla. With bold flavors and plenty of generous fruit, the palate delivers berry jam and dried fig alongside subtle spice notes. Dried cherry and mild black peppercorn linger on the finish.

* Unfortunately, wine shipping is highly regulated and we are not currently able to ship our New Zealand wines to the following states: Connecticut, Michigan, Missouri, Iowa, and Maine. Please check our store locator to find a store in your area.
